param.name: account
param.description: account. Must be used with the domainId parameter.

param.name: domainid
param.description: the domain ID. If used with the account parameter, lists virtual machines for the specified account in this domain.

param.name: forvirtualnetwork
param.description: list by network type; true if need to list vms using Virtual Network, false otherwise

param.name: hypervisor
param.description: the target hypervisor for the template

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the virtual machine

param.name: isrecursive
param.description: Must be used with domainId parameter. Defaults to false, but if true, lists all vms from the parent specified by the domain id till leaves.

param.name: storageid
param.description: the storage ID where vm's volumes belong to

response.name: id
response.description: the ID of the virtual machine

response.name: account
response.description: the account associated with the virtual machine

response.name: cpunumber
response.description: the number of cpu this virtual machine is running with

response.name: cpuspeed
response.description: the speed of each cpu

response.name: cpuused
response.description: the amount of the vm's CPU currently used

response.name: created
response.description: the date when this virtual machine was created

response.name: displayname
response.description: user generated name. The name of the virtual machine is returned if no displayname exists.

response.name: domain
response.description: the name of the domain in which the virtual machine exists

response.name: domainid
response.description: the ID of the domain in which the virtual machine exists

response.name: forvirtualnetwork
response.description: the virtual network for the service offering

response.name: group
response.description: the group name of the virtual machine

response.name: groupid
response.description: the group ID of the virtual machine

response.name: guestosid
response.description: Os type ID of the virtual machine

response.name: haenable
response.description: true if high-availability is enabled, false otherwise

response.name: hostid
response.description: the ID of the host for the virtual machine

response.name: hostname
response.description: the name of the host for the virtual machine

response.name: hypervisor
response.description: the hypervisor on which the template runs

response.name: ipaddress
response.description: the ip address of the virtual machine

response.name: isodisplaytext
response.description: an alternate display text of the ISO attached to the virtual machine

response.name: isoid
response.description: the ID of the ISO attached to the virtual machine

response.name: isoname
response.description: the name of the ISO attached to the virtual machine

response.name: jobid
response.description: shows the current pending asynchronous job ID. This tag is not returned if no current pending jobs are acting on the virtual machine

response.name: jobstatus
response.description: shows the current pending asynchronous job status

response.name: memory
response.description: the memory allocated for the virtual machine

response.name: name
response.description: the name of the virtual machine

response.name: networkkbsread
response.description: the incoming network traffic on the vm

response.name: networkkbswrite
response.description: the outgoing network traffic on the host

response.name: password
response.description: the password (if exists) of the virtual machine

response.name: passwordenabled
response.description: true if the password rest feature is enabled, false otherwise

response.name: rootdeviceid
response.description: device ID of the root volume

response.name: rootdevicetype
response.description: device type of the root volume

response.name: serviceofferingid
response.description: the ID of the service offering of the virtual machine

response.name: serviceofferingname
response.description: the name of the service offering of the virtual machine

response.name: state
response.description: the state of the virtual machine

response.name: templatedisplaytext
response.description: an alternate display text of the template for the virtual machine

response.name: templateid
response.description: the ID of the template for the virtual machine. A -1 is returned if the virtual machine was created from an ISO file.

response.name: templatename
response.description: the name of the template for the virtual machine

response.name: zoneid
response.description: the ID of the availablility zone for the virtual machine

response.name: zonename
response.description: the name of the availability zone for the virtual machine

response.name: nic-id
response.description: the ID of the nic

response.name: nic-broadcasturi
response.description: the broadcast uri of the nic

response.name: nic-gateway
response.description: the ID of the nic

response.name: nic-ip
response.description: the ip address of the nic

response.name: nic-isdefault
response.description: true if nic is default, false otherwise

response.name: nic-isolationuri
response.description: the isolation uri of the nic

response.name: nic-macaddress
response.description: the macaddress of the nic

response.name: nic-netmask
response.description: the netmask of the nic

response.name: nic-networkid
response.description: the ID of the corresponding network

response.name: nic-traffictype
response.description: the traffic type of the nic

response.name: nic-type
response.description: the type of the nic

response.name: securitygroup-id
response.description: the ID of the security group

response.name: securitygroup-account
response.description: the account owning the security group

response.name: securitygroup-description
response.description: the description of the security group

response.name: securitygroup-domain
response.description: the domain name of the security group

response.name: securitygroup-domainid
response.description: the domain id of the security group

response.name: securitygroup-jobid
response.description: shows the current pending asynchronous job ID. This tag is not returned if no current pending jobs are acting on the volume

response.name: securitygroup-jobstatus
response.description: shows the current pending asynchronous job status

response.name: securitygroup-name
response.description: the name of the security group

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-account
response.description: account owning the ingressrule rule

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-cidr
response.description: the CIDR notation for the base IP address of the ingressrule rule

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-endport
response.description: the ending IP of the ingressrule rule

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-icmpcode
response.description: the code for the ICMP message response

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-icmptype
response.description: the type of the ICMP message response

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-protocol
response.description: the protocol of the ingressrule rule

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-ruleid
response.description: the id of the ingressrule rule

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-securitygroupname
response.description: security group name

response.name: securitygroup-ingressrule-startport
response.description: the starting IP of the ingressrule rule
